website_summaries.verdict: A super high efficiency natural gas tankless hot water heater that is designated for indoor installation.
pros: This unit features technology that allows you to set recirculation patterns to coincide with your daily habits so you always have hot water when you need it
The heat exchanger comes with a 120 month warranty
cons: Rather pricy, but a much greater flow rate than the other models on our shortlist

customer_reviews.title: Careful buying and having delivered
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful unit. Replaced an older RHEEM 7.4 GPM unit installed in 2006 Easy to install, comes with almost everything required. BUT, and a BIG BUT - Amazon ships using UPS Box came beaten and open. Was missing the cold water isolation valve. (Amazon offered a credit equal to the cost of a replacement valve) At 70 pounds the item was probably tossed, kicked, rolled, dropped and pushed during the delivery process. This is not an Amazon problem but a common problem I have seen when ordering large , bulky or heavy items.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cervenka

customer_reviews.title: Great unit.  Energy saver!
customer_reviews.text: Constant hot water. Great energy saver. Only downside it takes a long time for the hot water to reach the faucets if you don’t have a return line installed.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Worth the effort.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced two 18 year old, 40 gallon WH’s. Watched a YouTube video, made program changes, and now its putting out 140° water. Very happy family. Have two water filters paralleled on supply side, to achieve better water flow.
customer_reviews.author: FlyinB

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Installation was done by a plumber. Would not want to attempt this with my skills. Has been working well. The one thing I would do is buy the one with the built in recirculation pump. Hot water takes about a 30 seconds to 1 minute.
customer_reviews.author: P. G.

customer_reviews.title: Hidden costs with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Very top of the line tankless water heater, excellent instant hot water and super quiet. It arrived very promptly in excellent protected packaging. Finding someone willing and capable of installing the unit was difficult. Getting it installed took me almost 3 weeks - super complicated because of BTU, distance from tank, other gas demands from heater, stove and dryer as well as the gas meter which was restricting gas flow. Just to complicate the issue, fresh air intake and exhaust had to be newly installed while the old exhaust was capped. So total install cost about $4000. The unit is a bargain. Other than that I'm super happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: The future of hot water heating.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, my house does not have a dedicated return line, but this model has Circ logic. So, if I decide to install an external recirculation pump I could easily install one. I have the option of connecting it the water heater or plugging it into a smart plug outlet and control the hot water heating through Amazon Alexa. This unit is quiet and efficient while providing endless hot water. No more waiting until my wife gets out of the shower to take a nice hot shower immediately. Dump your old hot water tank and upgrade to the future of hot water heating.
customer_reviews.author: ELLIOTT G.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best investments I’ve made for my house
customer_reviews.text: I installed this a few months ago. Wanted to try it for a while before I submitted a review. Works amazingly well! Extremely quiet! The only thing I didn’t take take into consideration, before I purchased this, was the amount of gas this really draws. I ended having to call the utility company and install a larger gas meter. Also, had to add larger gas lines in my house. Again, this was my fault that I didn’t add up all the BTUs for my gas appliances ahead of time. Just want to give you a heads up if you’re looking to purchase this. Highly recommend it and my wife loves not worrying about running out of hot water!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Miller

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good product. Was disappointed to find I was missing the union fitting for BOTH isolation valve upon arrival, as if it hadn't been packaged. Consequently had to reschedule all work for switch over to be done until after I get a hold of manufacturer. Looking forward to getting this running and will update my review at such time. Edit: After contacting rinnai, they sent me out the missing valves, albeit begrudgingly. The unit fired right up and I noticed no difference in time to receive hot water at fixtures. VERY quiet. The most inaudible gas appliance I have ever owned. Instructions were clear and very descriptive.
customer_reviews.author: reed

customer_reviews.title: Takes 120 seconds to get warm.
customer_reviews.text: This system was purchased brand new and it claims to be insta hot, but in reality I have to wait for the water to get just warm not HOT. The wait is a good 120 seconds Which to me is NOT insta HOT. For taps further away it is a MUCH LONGER WAIT. Please Be Advised!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Higman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing unit
customer_reviews.text: No issues with the unit. It was fairly easy to install given its size and weight. I have had no shortage of hot water even when in the shower with the washing machine and dishes being washed.
customer_reviews.author: that-guy-35

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had a built in Pump...
customer_reviews.text: The box came in torn apart. The actual heater only had a scratch in the front. But still the way that the box arrived was very unprofessional and sketch. So far it hasn’t given me any problems. But if I could go back I would have definitely returned the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Always hot water available and gas bill went down significantly!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Had no issues at all. Install went smoothly. Used a couple tricks from online (venting condensate drain and putting in additional tap-offs at supply and outlet lines). Never run out of water and have had multiple showers and appliances running with no lack of hot water.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great value and great water heater.
customer_reviews.text: This unit gives my family unlimited hot water. It’s important that you get the condensing vent For this water heater and not the regular vent. So far it has been working great.
customer_reviews.author: Minh Q Le

customer_reviews.title: Got hot water.  Get a plumber to install
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to install. Had my guy do it. He did a beautiful job on the installation, then the unit threw a code. Customer service wasn't helpful. Called a plumber who gave me the "I need hot water by tomorrow" price. Love the unit, could be much easier to install.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Delivered super fast. Needed it because my current water tank sprung a leak. If you are a DIY this is an easy install. Can take sometime running exhaust and intake lines if your basement is finished. If not it would be a piece of cake. Once installed it runs great. I can run multiple devices without temperature fluctuations. You will get a little water pressure drop when running more than two showers but not enough to bother you. All in all I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Code Jenson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced (2) 40-gallon electric water heaters with this tankless gas unit. Install was very simple, and registering with Rinnai was painless. My electric bill has been $150 less a month, and my gas bill has only gone up $8. I’m seeing immediate ROI.
customer_reviews.author: dowager

customer_reviews.title: Great heater
customer_reviews.text: Clear and precise instructions. Only took about an hour to install. Already recommended to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Majesik

customer_reviews.title: This one does what it says.
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a great deal of experience with tankless whole house water heaters, but my plumber was very happy, all critical gear was supplied. A few pieces of PVC and the gas line were all that was needed. Once the programming was in, never have given it a second thought.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Adams

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with product so far. It has solved several problems for me that I had. Easy to setup and it goes right to work.
customer_reviews.author: Danny A.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased on Amazon dropship saved me money.
customer_reviews.text: Save me a ton of money instead of purchasing through my plumber.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: will keep up with several things using hot water at the same time
customer_reviews.text: worked great. Wasn't hard to install and didn't need any adjustments
customer_reviews.author: David E.

customer_reviews.title: Sips Gas
customer_reviews.text: Installed in the spring, saved a bundle on hot water during that time
customer_reviews.author: StevieB

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great tankless water heater! Takes about 45 seconds for hot water, about the same time as my tank heater. Absolutely no problems at all. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Rinnai tu 199in
customer_reviews.text: Hot Water take the same time as the tank. I hope if I can use the bypass valve to get instant hot water. No more runout of hot water
customer_reviews.author: mohamedkaina

customer_reviews.title: Great !!
customer_reviews.text: For installation you need a professional Plummer , otherwise works perfect .
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken, had to return it
customer_reviews.text: arrived with a broken piece on the bottom of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Ayden Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe unit
customer_reviews.text: Was sold a unit I was told that only has cosmetic damage. The unit was UNSAFE, and LAEKED GAS which could have EXPLODED IN MY HOUSE!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Instant hot water isn't instant.
customer_reviews.text: 1st issue: This unit is supposed to have instant hot water, with a built in circulation pump. It takes several minutes for hot water to reach faucets. We have a contractor coming out tomorrow to install a separate circulation pump. Second issue: When we turn on the tub faucet to fill the tub, the force of the water drops about 50% when the hot water temp kicks in.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Behan

customer_reviews.title: make sure its what you ordered
customer_reviews.text: did not like that I ordered propane and received natural gas. Installed and had to ordered a conversion kit another 50.00 to make work right. no hot water for another week after purchase. Wife not happy
customer_reviews.author: Laura Mantle
